title: 3.6 Graphing Sine Wave
description: What does a sine wave look like? In this video I look at how to graph and animate a sine wave in p5.js varying the period and phase.

timestamps.title: Explain! How do we graph a wave?

Code! What happens if we go back to angular velocity?
Code! Whoa! Let's use a static increment value
See you in the next video!
